column5: Shops at Legacy location! Property view from living room and bedrooms look into the trees as if your in a tree house very serene. Soft pillows, great linens, a deeply plush bed, and a spa rain shower ensure your visit is a comfortable one. Each Shops at Legacy Stay includes: -Free Wifi -Free Keurig in-kitchen coffee -Queen size Deep Plush Bed -Shampoo, Body Soap Toiletries -24-hr Fitness center -Outdoor Swimming pool -Professionally decorated -Washer & Dryer -1 car Garage addtl daily charge
